meanings: (마음·사물의 한 부분) side, part, point, corner
(시골) the country, the countryside, rural area

examples.korean: She isn't one to stay in such a rural area as this. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 이런 촌구석에 있을 사람이 아니다 Neungyule
examples.english: She isn't one to stay in such a rural area as this. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I don't want to live in this backcountry anymore. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 더 이상 이런 촌구석에서 살고 싶지 않다 Neungyule
examples.english: I don't want to live in this backcountry anymore. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I don't want to live way back in the country anymore. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 더 이상 이런 촌구석에서 살고 싶지 않다 Neungyule
examples.english: I don't want to live way back in the country anymore. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Are you being condescending because I live out in the boonies? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 촌구석에 산다고 사람 무시하는 겁니까? Neungyule
examples.english: Are you being condescending because I live out in the boonies? Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He was this skinny little kid from a tiny little rural town. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 사람 촌구석에 살던 말라깽이 아이였지요. Neungyule
examples.english: He was this skinny little kid from a tiny little rural town. Add to Wordbook
